title: HOW TO GET 1 RP FOR FREE?
body:
Hi
Could u gift me 1 RP plz riot.
I need 1 riot point to buy my favourite nocturne skin. It is on sale in the special shop and it costs 156 RP whilst i have 155 RP (am i lucky or unlucky). So is there any way to get 1 RP without spending cash cause i only have like $3 in my bank account (blame it on uni).

replies.body: Submit an [RP art](http://rpart.riotgames.com/na/en/) to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and hope for the best :)
You can get some rp if you do some fan art for riot. Its a one time thing. I got some awhile back for doing a drawing of fullmetal jayce.
Send a ticket to riot throught support.
